titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 3762) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 2002 of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2016.
Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 3762) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 2002 of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2016.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 114-387, by Mr. Woodall.
Resolution provides for consideration of the Senate amendment to H.R. 3762.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 83.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 579.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 239 - 175 (Roll no. 2).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 177 (Roll no. 3).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary:
Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 3762) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 2002 of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2016.
Amends H.Res.5 to allow the chair of the following committees, for the remainder of the 114th Congress and upon consultation with the ranking minority member, to order the taking of depositions by a member or counsel of such committee:
Energy and Commerce; Financial Services; Science, Space, and Technology; and Ways and Means.
